hero-description: I’m a passionate full-stack developer focused on creating high quality projects in various languages. I specialize in many fields such as app development. My expertise encompasses both front-end and back-end development, including areas like artificial intelligence. I aim to create seamless digital experiences while adhering to best practices.
name: Alan
about-lead: With nearly 10 years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in creating efficient, scalable solutions that bridge technical excellence with user-centric design.
about-detail-1: My journey in technology began with a fascination for problem-solving through code. Over the years, I've honed my skills across the entire development stack, always prioritizing clean architecture and maintainable code.
about-detail-2: When not coding, I study various subjects such as Artificial Intelligence. I have a deep interest for learning, especially topics regarding the sciences such as physics and maths. I'm always keen to learn about new subjects such as genetic engineering and engineering.
proj-study-buddy-desc: Led a team of 6 developers in creating an ML‑powered matching system for student collaboration
proj-dart-ml-desc: Built from‑scratch matrix library & neural network with auto‑diff using Dart
proj-fl-research-desc: Co‑authored paper on defense mechanisms against poisoning attacks in federated learning
proj-race-timer-desc: Low‑latency timing system with WebSocket sync for competitive events
proj-token-lib-desc: Simple, efficient text tokenization library implemented in Dart
proj-shakespeare-desc: Encoder–decoder model trained on early modern English texts with attention
proj-cmd-parser-desc: Built a C# parser then ported to Dart + Flutter front‑end
proj-rl-ttt-desc: Q‑learning agent trained via self‑play with adjustable difficulty
proj-smart-home-desc: Python/Tkinter app for IoT device control and monitoring
proj-patchwork-desc: Creative layout tool built with Python/Tkinter
